fun.connor.lighter.injection

Interface InjectionObjectFactory

  • Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface InjectionObjectFactory
    A functional interface for generic injector interaction. The functional method of this interface has the same signature as typical newInstance methods on dependency injection Injector implementations. Lighter will use the InjectionObjectFactory to construct ANY and ALL user defined classes. Thus, the InjectionObjectFactory must be able to construct all ResourceController and all ProducesRequestGuard annotated factories.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T newInstance(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
      Create a new instance of the provided class.

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        <T> T newInstance(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Create a new instance of the provided class. If an invalid instance is returned by this method, Lighter will throw a RuntimeException.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type to construct
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to construct
        Returns:
        a valid instance of the class
